name: Qhonitar
description: A large creature resembling some fusion of an ant and a scorpion, but blown up to the size of a mountain lion. It crawls on six legs and has a long tail tipped with a stinger. It's mandibles are strong enough to chop off a limb. It tries to poison its prey by stinging it before biting.
The qhonitar's name means "forest ghost" in Izil and it is not native to this world.

0.name: Sting
0.description: The qhonitar stings one target within 4m. On hit, the target must make a DC10 FOR check or for the shorter of 2 full combat turns or passing a DC12 FOR check.

1.name: Bite
1.description: The qhonitar bites one target in its forward arc.

0.name: Alien War Animal
0.description: The qhonitar is Skilled in Acrobatics, Athletics, and Sneak, gaining a +4 to those skill checks.

1.name: Natural Armor
1.description: The qhonitar gains 2 damage reduction to Rending, Piercing, and Crushing damage sources.
